experience.title: Business Analyst Intern
experience.description: • Applied text mining methods on Quarterly Financial Reports of over 30 companies to preprocess the data using NLP• Applied feature engineering techniques like TF-IDF and n-grams to rate the significance of the most prevalent terms• Used Seaborn and Matplotlib to visualize the frequency of relevant terms and trends of impacts over time and categories• Used Web scrapping, NLP and Sklearn to deduce the information and then segmented 98% of over 75k customer data
experience.description_html: • Applied text mining methods on Quarterly Financial Reports of over 30 companies to preprocess the data using NLP• Applied feature engineering techniques like TF-IDF and n-grams to rate the significance of the most prevalent terms• Used Seaborn and Matplotlib to visualize the frequency of relevant terms and trends of impacts over time and categories• Used Web scrapping, NLP and Sklearn to deduce the information and then segmented 98% of over 75k customer data <!---->

experience.title: General Secretary Students' Welfare
experience.description: •Cooperated with Dean, Studens' Affairs and handled 15+ crisis situations working directly under   President, Technology students’ Gymkhana, in his executive council.•Organized 5-days Induction program - 2021 for an incoming batch consisting of 1800+ first-year   undergraduate students, IIT Kharagpur.•Spearheaded 20+ Institute level Programs and 30+ Interactive sessions, online and offline modes with   the assistance of teams SWG and IWG.•Facilitated communication skill-boosting of 2,000+ students through English Mentorship Program in   collaboration with ACSESS app.•Successfully coordinated with Deans' Office, Counseling centre, B.C Roy Technology Hospital in early detection and interception of crisis situations.
experience.description_html: •Cooperated with Dean, Studens' Affairs and handled 15+ crisis situations working directly under  President, Technology students’ Gymkhana, in his executive council.•Organized 5-days Induction program - 2021 for an incoming batch consisting of 1800+ first-year  undergraduate students, IIT Kharagpur.•Spearheaded 20+ Institute level Programs and 30+ Interactive sessions, online and offline modes with  the assistance of teams SWG and IWG.•Facilitated communication skill-boosting of 2,000+ students through English Mentorship Program in  collaboration with ACSESS app.•Successfully coordinated with Deans' Office, Counseling centre, B.C Roy Technology Hospital in early detection and interception of crisis situations.

positions.subtitle: Student Welfare Group, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: •Coordinated with the team of 10 heads and successfully executed the Student Mentorship program for 1800+ First-year Undergraduate Students and Conducted Mentor-Mentee Interaction with 400+ Mentors during the Induction Program 2021.• Spearheaded 15+ Institute level initiatives and events for the Academic Welfare and overall development of the student Community.

positions.description_html:

• Spearheaded 15+ Institute level initiatives and events for the Academic Welfare and overall development of the student Community.

positions.subtitle: Student Welfare Group, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: •Being a Core Team member, organized Student Mentorship Program for 1600+ first-year undergraduate   students with 400+ Mentors.•Led the team of 20 associate members and worked for the foresight series which give exposure to   Internships and Placements.•Worked closely with the Tech team for increasing the reach of the S W G mobile Application through   collaborations with 20+ societies.•Organized 10+ events along with a team of 30+ students and worked on various initiatives for the   welfare of the student community.

experience.title: Executive Head

positions.subtitle: National Students' Space Challenge
positions.description: •Being the part of Sponsorship team, worked under the guidance of 3 Sponsorship Heads.•Actively involved in selecting 22 first-year students team with a team of 15 sub-heads.•Coordinated the teams of 15 subheads and successfully organised the fresher's space quiz and Introductory seminar for the First-year students.

positions.description_html:

•Coordinated the teams of 15 subheads and successfully organised the fresher's space quiz and Introductory seminar for the First-year students.

positions.subtitle: National Students' Space Challenge
positions.description: •Responsible for the accommodation of 2000+ student participants for 3 days on campus and managed   2 Guest Lectures during the fest.•Successfully executed 3 events with the guidance of the Head and sub-head of events during the fest   and manages registrations of participants.•Responsible for in-house publicity of the Annual Space Tech fest and managed the merchandise of the   National Students' Space Challenge.
